Damage: 4D '''Capsule''': The Simiyiar-class light freighter was a popular Mon Calamari transport in use during the Galactic Civil War. It was 26.3 meters in length and armed with a turreted dual laser cannon and an ion cannon. It could carry eight passengers and 150 tons of cargo, and was equipped with a backup shield generator.
